valvulas.product_line: Cast steel gate, globe and check valves
valvulas.nombre: Cast Steel Swing Check Valves for Nuclear Applicatons
valvulas.descripcion: Available for nuclear class 1, 2, and 3 and safety related applications. Design features
caracteristicas: Body and cover castings are precision machined. Exclusive: Disc shaft does not penetrate body.
Body and cover joint accurately machined. Fully-enclosed gasket.

Disc: Robust one-piece construction to withstand the severe shock of check valve service. Hardfaced with 13Cr, CoCr alloy, SS 316, or Monel, ground and lapped to a mirror finish. Sizes NPS 2–6 (DN 50–150) may have solid CA 15 (13Cr) disc. SS 316 disc with CoCr alloy facing also available.

Disc assembly: Non-rotating disc is fastened securely to disc hanger with a lock nut and cotter pin. Disc hanger is supported on a sturdy disc carrier hinge pin of excellent bearing qualities. All parts are accessible from top for easy servicing.
FlangesASME Classes 150–300: 1⁄16” raised face.ASME Classes 600–1500: ¼” raised face.Finish: 125–250 AARH for all valves.

valvulas.product_line: Cast steel gate, globe and check valves
valvulas.nombre: Cast Steel Gate Valves for Nuclear Applications
valvulas.descripcion: Available for nuclear class 1, 2, and 3 and safety related applications. Design features
caracteristicas: Seat face CoCr alloy hardfaced, ground, and lapped to a mirror finish.

Flexible wedge with low center stem-wedge contact, in solid CA15 (13Cr) or hardfaced with 13Cr, SS 316, Monel, or CoCr alloy. Wedge is ground and lapped to a mirror finish and tightly guided to prevent dragging and seat damage.
Hardfacing of wedge guiding surfaces available when specified by purchaser.
Non-rotating stem with precision Acme threads and burnished finish. Double start Acme for faster operation.
Gland has two-piece construction for easy alignment.
Body and bonnet joint accurately machined.
Body and bonnet castings are precision machined. One-piece bonnet (2) for better alignment and fewer parts.
End connection flanges in accordance with ASME B16.5ASME Classes: 150–300: 1⁄16” raised face.ASME Classes: 600–1500: ¼” raised face.Finish: 125–250 AARH for all valves.
Rotating stem nut in Austenitic ductile iron Gr. D-2C and serviceable in line. When handwheel is used, thrust bearing arrangements vary depending on valve size and class.

valvulas.product_line: Cast steel gate, globe and check valves
valvulas.nombre: Cast Steel Globe, Stop Check, and Needle Valves for Nuclear Applications
valvulas.descripcion: Available for nuclear class 1, 2, and 3 and safety related applications. Design features

especificaciones.Standard Connections: End connection flanges in accordance with ASME B16.5

caracteristicas: Unique non-rotating stem design is easily adaptable foractuation–with precision Acme threads and burnished finish.Valve suitable for horizontal installation.
All sizes and pressure classes have conical seats to ensuretight shut-off.
Seat face CoCr alloy hardfaced, ground, and lapped to a mirrorfinish. Conical seat machined to fine surface finish.

Body guided disc ensures smooth, robust operation and accurately mates the seating surface of the disc with the surface of the body seat, which is ground and lapped to a mirror finish. When specified by the purchaser, the disc guides are hardfaced to enhance smooth guiding and extend their wear life.
Body and bonnet castings are precision machined. One-piecebonnet(1)for better alignment, fewer parts.
Body and bonnet joint accurately machined to the requiredserrated surface finish. Fully enclosed gasket.
Gland has two-piece construction for easy alignment.
Torque arm reduces wear on packing rings, enables better sealingand reduces torque.
Rotating stem nut is austenitic ductile iron Gr. D-2C serviceable inline. When handwheel is used, thrust bearing arrangements varydepending on valve size and class.

Impactor handwheels globe, stop check, and needle valves require higher closing torques than gate valves with the same seat diameter and pressure class. The most economical mechanism for tight shutoff is the impactor handwheel. Two lugs cast under the wheel strike simultaneous blows and give 3–10 times the closing force of standard handwheels. Impactor handwheels are supplied at manufacturer’s option unless specified by the purchaser.

valvulas.nombre: API 623 Cast Steel Globe, Stop Check, and Needle Valves
valvulas.descripcion: Válvula Cast steel gate, globe and check valves de alta calidad para aplicaciones industriales.
caracteristicas: Unique non-rotating stem design is easily adaptable for actuation–with precision Acme threads and burnished finish. Valve suitable for horizontal installation.
All graphite packed globe valves are dual qualified to API 624 and ISO-15848-1. Stuffing box burnished to fine surface finish.
Trim: Available in all trim material combinations specified in API 623, as well as custom material combinations.
All sizes and pressure classes have conical seats to ensure tight shut-off.

valvulas.nombre: Proquip Dual-Plate Check Valve: Wafer Type
valvulas.descripcion: Válvula Dual plate check valves de alta calidad para aplicaciones industriales.
caracteristicas: Retainerless emission-free design. With no holes through the body wall, leakage to the outside is impossible.
Body surface with uninterrupted gasket surface.
Intrinsically fire safe.
The reduced weight of the disc minimizes slamming and water hammer.
The disc side hinges, eliminate the effect of gravity resulting in lower energy costs when installed in a horizontal pipeline.
Design maximizes the flow path area through the valve with a lower pressure drop. The internal retention method does not encroach on the gasket sealing surface.
Springs provide a fast-acting response to flow reversal, minimizing stress and maximizing service life.
Shock bumpers extended cycle life of internal components with minimal wear in severe service.
Extended seat life due to the clearance between the disc hinge and hinge pin which eliminates any dragging effect from the discs.
Velan Proquip dual plate check valves easily meet and exceed test requirements of API 598 for metal-seated check valves.

valvulas.nombre: API 602 Hydrofluoric Acid Alkylation Gate Valve
valvulas.descripcion: Válvula Hydrofluoric acid alkylation valves de alta calidad para aplicaciones industriales.

especificaciones.Standard Connections: Threaded, socket weld, flanged, butt weld

caracteristicas: Fugitive emissions are a critical factorin the performance of any HF Acid valve and at Velan, we have been committed to reducing emissions beyond the industry standards, and providing the highest quality products to our customers for over 50 years. Velan offers a comprehensive line of Phillips and UOP approved API 602 gate, globe and check HF acid valves with several benefits.
Packing chamber has nickel overlay to protect from severe alkylation conditions and to guarantee low fugitive emissions.
Stem is made from solid age hardened K-Monel® 500 for increased strength and corrosion resistance.
Bonnet joint is precision machined and has a special surface finish for extended service life.
Fully encapsulated gasket design with metal-to-metal body to bonnet contact for optimal and controlled gasket compression.

Body/bonnet threads and strength-weld: for welded bonnet valves, the bonnet is threaded-in and torqued to an engineered torque value and the body bonnet joint is strength-welded, offering double protection against leakage.
Repairable two-piece stem drive.
API 602 conventional port and full port designs available.
Wide variety of end connections as per client’s needs: flanged, BW, SW, NPT, weld stubs, including other types.
HF acid detecting paint allows for an immediate visual detection when exposed to acid or acid vapors to ensure valve integrity.

valvulas.nombre: Securaseal L-Series High Temperature Ball Valve
valvulas.descripcion: The Velan Type L high-temperature metal-seated ball valve is well suited for a variety of demanding services where high-temperature and abrasive solids are present.
caracteristicas: Unique, patented single-seat ball valve design. The Velan single-seat ball valve has a flat spring set acting through a hardfaced bearing against the bottom ball shaft which provides sufficient initial ball-seat load for valve tightness, even at low delta P.
The design provides freedom for thermal expansion of the ball without jamming, even at extreme temperatures.
Proven in qualification tests and field operation to be solids–proof, even for the toughest applications on slurry service with solids.
Tightness rates: Allowable leakage rate at full delta P: ASME/ FCI 70-2 Class V. Tighter shutoff available upon request.
Max. operating temperature: CF8M valves: 1,450°F (788°C). WCB valves: 800°F (426°C). Chrome Moly C5 or C12: 1,000°F (538°C).
Wall thickness complies with ASME B16.34.

valvulas.descripcion: ​AUTOMATIONThe electric, hydraulic or pneumatic actuator is selected in function of coker service. A large torque safety factor ensures the valve will cycle under the most stringent conditions. When selecting actuators, special attention is paid to t...
caracteristicas: The sturdy one-piece ball and stemprovides optimal strength, and is well suited to applications where fouling due to coke fines are a concern. The one-piece design avoids the problems generally associated with the more conventional two-piece ball and stem, which is highly susceptible to solids buildup in the ball-stem joint and a resulting increase in operating torques.Avoids hysteresis and misalignment.
A Lantern ringwith steam block and extra deep stuffing box minimizes the risk of leakage occurring through the packing chamber. Live-loading is available on request.
Strong bellowsoffer a unique seat loading design that maintains the floating seats in constant contact with the ball and ensures a positive seal.
Velan’s unique scraper type seats designscrapes coke buildup from the surface of the ball during each cycle. Seats are hard-faced to ensure a long, trouble-free service life.
Steam purgesto bellows and body area ensure the valve cavities are kept free of coke buildup.

The stem couplingis designed to perform three main functions:Protect against “overtorquing” of the stem.Protect the actuator components.Protect against an unintentional switch into bypass (typically applies to four-way switch).
Protect against “overtorquing” of the stem.
Protect the actuator components.

Body guided disc eliminates side thrust and provides longer disc, seat, and body life.
Pre-positioned field injection ports for precise application of low emissions (Low-E) injectable packing through the bonnet (applies to bolted bonnet globe NPS 1/4–2 (DN 8–50) Class 150–1500).
Available disc designs: stop, stop check, needle, and flow control.

valvulas.nombre: Torqseal® 2.0 Triple Offset Valve
valvulas.descripcion: Velan’s Torqseal® 2.0 triple offset valve is engineered to deliver repeatable full bi-directional zero leakage, lower torques and superior fugitive emissions performance. Offering a bi-directional zero leakage closure with a metal-to-metal seat, the ...

especificaciones.Standard Connections: Lug, Double flanged (short and long) pattern, Butt weld

caracteristicas: The Torqseal® advanced design features a triple eccentricity and unique elliptical seat geometry, that allows for friction free, non-rubbing operation of the valve during all of the valve travel.

Zero leakage seat tightness (API 598 resilient seat standard). The resilient metal seal ring radially compresses around it’s circumference when torque is evenly applied as the seal ring makes contact with the integral metal body seat.
The robust centered-weighted splined connection between disc/shaft produces a uniform and repeatable torque transmissionand ensures even distribution of contact pressure between seat and seal.
Torqseal® valves are dual qualified for API 641 and ISO-15848-1 fugitive emission requirements.
Torqseal® valves are fire safe qualified.

valvulas.nombre: Torqseal® Triple Offset Cryogenic Valve
valvulas.descripcion: DESIGN FEATURES:
caracteristicas: Triple-offset disc rotation: Provides bubble-tight sealing without rubbing or galling.
Cryogenic stem packing: Composed of superposed Viton O-rings and expanded graphite rings (fire safe approved).
Low fugitive emissions: in accordance with ISO 15848/Ta-Luft.
No cavity: No cavity to prevent build-up of solids.
Drainage possibility: The bottom cover can be removed if drainage is required.
Internal blow-out protection: Prevents the shaft from blowing out under pressure.
Inherent fire safe function: Stainless steel construction and metallic seal provide inherent fire safe function.

Extended bonnet: With a sufficient gas column to keep the stem packing away from cold fluid. Extended bonnet length is qualified for use in LNG application with type approvals from major classification societies.

Actuator: Manual, pneumatic (single or double-acting type), electric or hydraulic according to customer specification. ON/OFF or MODULATING function according to the application. Fast-acting actuators for Emergency Shut Down (ESD) also available.
High quality castings: Radiographic control, dye penetrant test, ferrite content control, impact test at -196ºC according to customers’ requirements.
